output: A marathon runner, face set with a determined expression and legs pounding the pavement in a steady stride, runs under the harsh midday sun. Sweat glistens on their skin, illuminated by golden rays streaming through the city streets. A throng of cheering spectators lines the route, their joyful faces adding to the vibrant backdrop. The image should capture the raw endurance and ultimate triumph of crossing the finish line.
